name: Draw Duet
description:
A fun 2-player drawing game that encourages creative communication across neurodiversities (made as part of the Autistica Play Jam 2020 by Alyssa T. Mello)

Autism can mean people think or communicate differently than one might expect, but it can also mean they are uniquely creative and come up with imaginative ideas. 

Let's draw a picture together and discover the amazing, creative ways our neurodiverse brains work!
